DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluates the effects of 12 weeks of whole body electrostimulation (WB-EMS) and dietetic treatment in patients with malignant disease on curative or palliative treatment situation on body composition, muscle strength and quality of life.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of WB-EMS and Dietetic Treatment on Cancer Patients
DOC.criteria: malignant disease: colon carcinoma, stomach cancer, oesophageal cancer, pancreas carcinoma, liver cell carcinoma, cholangiocarcinoma, bronchial carcinoma, mamma carcinoma, cervix cancer, prostate cancer, renal cell carcinoma, malignant melanoma, patients with leukaemia or GraftversusHostDisease after bone marrow transplantation, tumour diseases of the cervical, pharyngeal or mouth area curative or palliative treatment situation men and women over, at least 18 years or older coincident participation in other interventional trials cardiovascular events use of medications with influence on muscular metabolism epilepsy severe neurological diseases skin lesions in the area of electrodes energy active metals in body
